name: An Offering To The Golden Witch
name_original: An Offering To The Golden Witch
description:
After her tale has ended and the catbox has closed, Jessica is invited by a mysterious woman who looks exactly like Beatrice to witness a new tale that takes place on Rokkenjima.

Meanwhile, the 1986 family conference is just about to happen, and Jessica Ushiromiya welcomes her cousins to Rokkenjima. However, soon enough a new tragedy begins.

An Offering to the Golden Witch is an Umineko When They Cry forgery centered around Jessica and an original murder mystery on Rokkenjima. Its length is about 4 hours and it contains 4 endings.

Most of the content warnings that apply to the original work apply to this one as well.

This fanwork contains spoilers for all 8 Umineko episodes, and should only be played after having played the entirety of Umineko.

Credits can be found on the about page in the game.
